briefTitle: Study Evaluating Bazedoxifene/Conjugated Estrogens Combinations In Postmenopausal Women
officialTitle: A Double-Blind, Randomized, Placebo- And Active-Controlled Efficacy And Safety Study Of Bazedoxifene/Conjugated Estrogens Combinations For Prevention Of Endometrial Hyperplasia And Prevention Of Osteoporosis In Postmenopausal Women
summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether bazedoxifene/conjugated estrogens combinations are effective for the prevention of endometrial hyperplasia and for the prevention of osteoporosis in postmenopausal women.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Hyperplasia at Screening
